settings.testimonial_text: "These don't wreck my gut like the stevia ones!"
‚ÄúI sh*t you not my headaches are gone"
"Three days in and I actually feel fresh!"

settings.list_block_type_subtext: See how good you feel using Buoy for a month. Don't love it? It's on us.
Based on 5-8 daily servings of Buoy reviewed by over 100+ dieticians.

settings.ship_text:
Free Shipping on all orders

Free Shipping on all International orders over $149

Reach out to us for more information on international orders.
settings.product_feature_text: Energy, Gut Health, Brain Function, Skin
settings.product_feature_text_two: Delivered in 3x more bioavailable form factor

settings.title: Health Benefits
settings.icon_image_text_1:
Energy
Ionic ocean electrolytes and trace minerals for cellular hydration and natural energy.
settings.icon_image_text_2:
Brain Function
Brain-activating minerals reduce brain fog and mental fatigue while boosting memory and focus.
settings.icon_image_text_3:
B Vitamin Complex
Fortify your gut lining with 87 ionic trace minerals that balance the microbiome and enhance your gut‚Äôs inflammation response.
settings.icon_image_text_4:
Glowing Skin
Restore beautifying electrolytes and minerals that support supple skin and skin elasticity.

settings.title: Form Factor
settings.text: Liquid Drops are up to 3x more bioavailable than traditional supplement forms like pills, powders and tablets.
settings.list_item4: Add into 4-7 full beverages per day starting with your morning cup

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.text: Buoy only uses whole-food sourced ingredients in their natural forms.
settings.icon_image_list_3:
• Supports routine electrolyte function
  • Methylated note for those with MTHR: Methylation is typically only in reference to Vitamins B9 and B12, which is not used in Hydration Drops.
settings.icon_image_list_4: • Potent, natural stabilizer without adding  citric acid
settings.list_item2:
No Carbs or Calories
Fasting friendly electrolytes!

settings.title: Sourcing & Formulation
settings.text: Supplements shouldn't be manufactured. Hydrate with nature's original electrolyte and mineral boost: the deep ocean.
settings.text2: Buoy's Scientific Advisory Board formulates and tests every product we create.
settings.list_item3_2: 3 Clinical Trials in Progress Highlighting Efficacy

settings.title: Sip On Cellular Hydration
settings.text: Elevate the drinks you‚Äôre already drinking by adding  one quick squeeze 4‚Äì7 times per day.

settings.title: Why should I subscribe?
settings.text: Transformative health benefits come with consistent habits.  Our flexible, sustainable subscription plan supports whole-body  at a cellular level, order after order, for just $1/day. Try today,  100% Risk Free.
settings.text1: Fast Hydration ¬∑ Mineral Support ¬∑ Soothes Headaches ¬∑ Eases Cramps ¬∑ Helps Hangovers
settings.text2: Promotes Nutrient Absorption ¬∑ Alkalizes The Body ¬∑ Supports Detoxification ¬∑ Enhanced Cognition ¬∑ Radiant Skin
settings.list_item3:
Cancel or pause anytime
Even after your first order

settings.title: Will I taste anything?
settings.text: Buoy is purposefully unflavored, which means we do not hide behind the sweet and inflammatory ingredients like sugar, stevia, dextrose and "natural" flavors other electrolytes do.
settings.text1: Hydration Drops harvest electrolytes and minerals in their most bioavailable form. While many people don't notice a taste in most beverages, everyone's palette is different and so you may notice hints of a subtle mineral flavor.
settings.title2: A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY
settings.text2: One serving is a single, short squeeze into a full beverage. Each serving contains a ‚Öì of the electrolyte content of a sports drink.For those noticing a strong taste, you've likely squeezed too much into a single beverage or a half-full beverage.

settings.title: Will Buoy break my fast?
settings.text:
Nope!

Unlike other electrolytes, Buoy will not change your metabolic state regardless of how many servings you use.

settings.title: How long until you see results?
settings.text:
Buoy‚Äôs hard-to-find essential nutrients are important for foundational health in the long run.

Depending on how chronically dehydrated you are when you start Buoy will affect how intense of a feeling you might notice. Headaches, cramping, midday fatigue, grogginess and drier skin are all symptoms of dehydration.
settings.text1: While a lot of people using Buoy notice results after about a week of consistent use, some don‚Äôt‚Äîand that‚Äôs okay.
settings.text2: It can take up to a month or two for your body to reach a new normal. Rest assured, our high bioavailable and fast-absorbing ingredients get to work quickly and target nutrient gaps in the American diet.

settings.title: Are your B vitamins methylated?
settings.text:
Methylation is typically in reference to Vitamins B9 and B12 because of cheap, widely used and non-absorbable forms these specific vitamins. These vitamins are not used in any Buoy products.

The B Vitamins used in Buoy typically do not come in a methylated form
  • (there is a rare B6 form floating around but is not standard or widely used)
    • .

    For the vitamins used, Buoy sources the cleanest, most absorbable forms of B1, B5, and B6. Methylation is typically a term used with B vitamins that aren't in Buoy

settings.title: Do your products have caffeine?
settings.text:
Hydration Drops does not contain caffeine.

The only product that contains caffeine is our Energy Drops, which is sourced from organic green tea.

settings.title: We want you to ask questions

settings.text: Complete your hydration ritual with our Rescue Salt.
Want to try them all? Build a custom bundle.

settings.title: A better way to hydrate
settings.subtext: Add a fast-acting electrolyte and mineral replenishment to all your favorite drinks.

settings.text: Function, Not Flavor
Function, Not Flavor
Function, Not Flavor
Function, Not Flavor
Function, Not Flavor
Function, Not Flavor
Function, Not Flavor
Function, Not Flavor

settings.title: ‚ú® Mineral Replenishment
settings.text: Before modern agriculture and commercially bottled water, 75% of our absorbable mineral content came from natural water sources. Buoy works to replenish those minerals that are absent in even the healthiest of diets.

settings.title: ü•¶ Nutrient Absorption
settings.text: Even minor deficiencies or inbalances in mineral levels can negatively impact our ability to absorb nutrients. Get the most out of the nutrients you intake by replenishing these fundamental minerals and electrolytes throughout the day.

settings.title: üòå Gut Health
settings.text: Electrolytes work to support a healthy gut. Buoy‚Äôs minerals and biological elements help to balance the microbiome, fortify the gut lining and enhance the gut‚Äôs inflammation response.

settings.title: ü´ñ Detoxification
settings.text: Your liver requires adequate electrolytes and trace minerals to remove unwanted toxins. Buoy promotes these enzymatic reactions by replenishing mineral deficiencies.

settings.title: üí° Cognition & Mood
settings.text: In men, low electrolyte and mineral levels promote feelings of anxiety and nervouseness; in women, these imbalances present as sluggishness and brain fog. Replenish adequate amounts of them daily for sharper focus, more motivation and lifted moods.

settings.title: Sip on functional benefits
settings.text_bottom: Buoy‚Äôs benefits go beyond peak hydration. Refresh, revitalize and restore with the electrolytes and minerals our bodies need to function optimally day after day.

settings.title: Seawater Electrolytes
settings.text: Hand harvested, seawater electrolytes from protected marine sea salt in the South of France. Preserved in their naturally-occurring, balanced ratios for deep hydration your cells crave.

settings.title: Deep Ocean Trace Minerals
settings.text: 87 ionically charged trace minerals and biological elements from the deep ocean that revitalize, restore and rebuild at the cellular level.

settings.title: B Vitamins
settings.text: A curated blend of plant-powered B vitamins that support routine electrolyte function and facilitate energy production.

settings.title: Antioxidants
settings.text: Soothe the daily inflammation that depletes electrolyte and mineral levels faster than your body naturally would with plant-powered antioxidants.

settings.title: Ingredients your body can actually absorb
settings.subtext: Harvested | Bioavailable | Fast-Absorbing

settings.title: A hydration profile like no other

settings.title: Healthy habits with healthier perks
settings.subtext: Join the Clear Pee Club for your daily dose of hydration and minerals. Never run dry with this planet-friendly subscription plan.

settings.title: Is it really flavorless?
settings.answer:
Electrolytes, vitamins, and ionic trace minerals are bitter by nature. That‚Äôs why traditional sports drinks and hydration supplements use sugar and sweeteners to offset their intense taste.

Finding the balance between effective, clean ingredients and a neutral flavor profile took our team of scientists two years to get right. With a proper dosage in a full drink, you should notice little to no taste.

settings.title: What kind of testing do you do?
settings.answer:
All Buoy products are third-party tested.

All products are tested for impurities like toxins, microbes, metals, allergens and other contaminants. We also test for shelf-stability and accurate nutrition labels.

For every product we create, we publish whitepapers highlighting their efficacy and safety.

settings.title: How long until I see results?
settings.answer:
Buoy‚Äôs hard-to-find essential nutrients are important for foundational health in the long run.

Depending on how chronically dehydrated you are when you start Buoy will affect how intense of a feeling you might notice. Headaches, cramping, midday fatigue, grogginess and drier skin are all symptoms of dehydration.

While a lot of people using Buoy notice results after about a week of consistent use, some don‚Äôt‚Äîand that‚Äôs okay.

It can take up to a month or two for your body to reach a new normal. Rest assured, our high bioavailable and fast-absorbing ingredients get to work quickly and target nutrient gaps in the American diet.

settings.title: How does the Clear Pee Club work?
settings.answer:
Never run dry with our flexible subscription plan.

Buoy‚Äôs ingredient panel supports foundational health with hydration and minerals that work at the cellular level. We created a product important for daily life. We centered our business model around long-term discounts that help you build healthy habits.

Before each shipment, we‚Äôll send you an email and text to make sure you‚Äôre ready. Rush, delay or cancel your subscription at any time, right from your phone or laptop.

Try our subscription risk free. If we‚Äôre not a good fit after your first month, we‚Äôll give you a full refund.

settings.title: Will Buoy break my fast?
settings.answer:
Nope ü§†.

We‚Äôre talking to you, keto and intermittent fasting dieters. We formulated all Buoy products to be a sidekick to any diet, specifically those looking to stay in ketosis or a fasting state.

settings.title: Why do other products have larger serving sizes?
settings.answer:
Hydration is a turtle‚Äôs race‚Äîslow and steady wins.
Your body will pass most of the nutrients in large, single-serving doses before you can actually use them.

Our approach to hydration is backed by our body's biochemisty and formulated for daily dehydration.

We use high bioavailable and fast-absorbing ingredient sources so you're able to get the most out of every drop.

Each bottle has the electrolyte equivalent of 13 sports drinks, without the junk.

settings.title: Does this have caffeine?
settings.answer: Nope üòä. Only our Energy Drops contain caffeine.

settings.title: Ask us the tough ones
settings.text: Our exceptional team of healthcare professionals and scientists have answers.

settings.heading: Dietician‚Äôs Recommended Use:
settings.title: 4-7 times daily (560mg-980mg electrolytes)
settings.sub_title: Reviewed by over 100+ dieticians and Buoy‚Äôs three pending clinical studies.
settings.content:
Add a squeeze of Buoy into 4-7 full beverages throughout the day, starting with your morning cup and ending with the last beverage you drink before bed.
Increase daily servings if exercising, living in a hot climate or drinking alcohol.

settings.item_description: Type 1 Diabetes ‚Äî Estimated Trial Results Mid 2024
Chemotherapy Dehydration ‚Äî Estimated Trial Results Late 2024

settings.heading: Primary Outcome Measures:
settings.title: Net Fluid Balance
settings.text_block_one: Time Frame: Urine will be measured during each visit (3 total visits that each last 6 hours)
settings.text_block_two: Determined by subtracting the cumulative urine output from the total fluid load consumed
settings.block_two_text_block_one: Time Frame: Urine will be measured during each visit (3 total visits that each last 6 hours)
settings.block_two_text_block_two: Sodium, Potassium, and Chloride levels will be measured
settings.block_three_text_block_one: Time Frame: Venous blood collection will occur at the screening visit and as necessary pending any changes to the patient's medical history and status.
settings.block_three_text_block_two: Venous whole blood will be collected using phlebotomy and 100ul will be analyzed using an i-STAT
settings.secondary_text_block_one: Time Frame: Each urine collection occurs for a total of 6 hours
settings.secondary_text_block_two: Bioimpedence measured after each urine collection

settings.title: Clinical Trial Updates
settings.about: In 2023, Buoy‚Äôs Hydration Drops were greenlit for three third-party clinical trials registered with the National Institute of Health highlighting efficacy for:

settings.title: 2024 HSA & FSA eligibility
settings.about:
Buoy‚Äôs Rescue Salt is pending HSA and FSA eligibility for those using their health and flexible savings accounts to pay for qualified medical expenses.
By January 2024, Buoy‚Äôs Rescue Salt should be HSA & FSA approved.
